mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.groupnum AS "groupnum", a.chang AS "chang", a.p1 AS "peopleNote.id", a.score1 AS "score1", a.matchid as "matchid", a.btype as "btype", a.type as "type", a.lun as "lun", a.jushu as "jushu", b.name as "peopleNote.name", b.orgname as "peopleNote.orgname"
left join bisai_people_note b on a.p1 = b.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bisai_people_group( groupnum, chang, p1, score1, matchid, btype, type, lun, jushu ) VALUES ( #{groupnum}, #{chang}, #{peopleNote.id}, #{score1}, #{matchid}, #{btype}, #{type}, #{lun}, #{jushu} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bisai_people_group SET groupnum = #{groupnum}, chang = #{chang}, p1 = #{peopleNote.id}, score1 = #{score1} matchid = #{matchid}, btype = #{btype}, type = #{type}, lun = #{lun}, jushu = #{jushu}, WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from bisai_people_group where matchid=#{matchid} and btype=#{btype}
mapper.select: select groupnum from bisai_people_group where matchid=#{match.id} and btype=#{btype} and type=#{type} and lun=#{saizhi} group by groupnum
select lun from bisai_people_group where matchid=#{match.id} and btype=#{btype} and type=#{type} group by lun
select count(1) from bisai_people_group where matchid=#{matchid} and btype=#{btype} and type=#{type} and score1 is null

select DISTINCT groupnum from bisai_people_group where matchid = matchid and lun = (select max(lun) from bisai_people_group where matchid=#{matchid})
